content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the apartment's desirable location in the city center with access to all necessary amenities, I seek a competitive yet reasonable price. What figure would you propose as a starting point for negotiations?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While the offered price of €1000 seems higher than what I anticipate for this unfurnished one-bedroom apartment, I'm open to discussing further. Could we possibly explore a lower option, say around €850 per month, considering its recent construction and the convenience of its location?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [Unfriendly] €850 is too low. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because it is not even close to my proposed price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your stance but disappointed with the lack of flexibility, I shall now terminate this negotiation. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
